summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5514 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 1 and 2, Queen Anne Central Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue West and 5th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Smith Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70582, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
